thread.title: Ben Gibson drafted into England squad for World Cup qualifier against Lithuania
thread.title_full: Ben Gibson drafted into England squad for World Cup qualifier against Lithuania

author: dwright
title: Ben Gibson drafted into England squad for World Cup qualifier against Lithuania
text:
gibson's call Ben Gibson drafted into England squad for World Cup qualifier against Lithuania 
Middlesbrough defender Gibson called up by Gareth Southgate with Gary Cahill suspended and Phil Jones injured By Duncan Wright 24th March 2017, 12:40 pm Updated: 24th March 2017, 12:53 pm Comments BEN GIBSON has been called into the England squad for the World Cup qualifier against Lithuania. 
Middlesbrough defender Gibson has been drafted into the Three Lions group by boss Gareth Southgate as he prepares his team for Sunday’s match at Wembley. Reuters 3 Ben Gibson has been drafted into the England squad by Gareth Southgate 
The 24-year-old has linked up with the England squad today after they returned from their Germany training camp last night. 
Keep up to date with ALL the latest football news , gossip and rumours 
Southgate decided to call up more defensive cover after Manchester United defender Phil Jones was sent back to his club last week through injury. Rex Features 3 England are without the suspended Gary Cahill for their match with Lithuania 
His decision to play three at the back proved successful in Dortmund even though the side eventually slipped to a 1-0 defeat . 
And with Gary Cahill suspended from the Lithuania match, it left the side short of cover should any of the other defenders suffer a problem. 
Gibson has been on the stand-by list for past England squads but has never received a senior call-up. Most read in football sealing the deal Jose Mourinho pictured in Croatia as he bids to get £35million Ivan Perisic deal over the line Coleman career fear WARNING GRAPHIC: Seamus Coleman's leg broken by Neil Taylor horror tackle as Wales defender sent off in draw with Ireland UniTeD MOVE LIKE GRIEZ LIGHTNIN' Man Utd close in on Antoine Griezmann with move said to be a formality A FINE MESS Lionel Messi 'facing ban after hurling abuse at officials' following Argentina's 1-0 win over Chile 'He wants to right that wrong' Jermain Defoe wants to quit Sunderland and re-join West Ham, reveals Ian Wright run of form 'He was so naturally fit he could play a match, run a marathon and then probably have a kickabout with his friends'.. N'Golo Kante's ex-teammates recall his unlikely rise to stardom PA:Press Association 3 Ben Gibson has been one of the few success stories for Middlesbrough this season 
But now he finally gets his chance to stake a claim for an international place as a reward for his impressive displays for Boro this season. 
Gibson has been one of the few success stories for Middlesbrough during a difficult season which sees them struggling in the relegation zone in the Premier League.
